linkModule.name: Big Cube
linkModule.description: A big cube! This takes a thousand years, but you can ask for different colors on the inside for fun effects!

linkModule.name: Loose Cube
linkModule.description: A cube made with big-ass rings, so that it jiggles a lot. Honestly, it barely looks like a cube, but it's extra fun to shake and it makes a fun sound.

linkModule.name: Pride Cube
linkModule.description: A cube with a pride pattern. If you are homophobic on my website you will get struck by lightning a thousand times
